errors.error_description: The setup guide incorrectly specifies Python 2.7 for development, but the project has been migrated to Python 3.
correction_candidates: Make sure you have Python 3.6 or higher installed on your system.
Make sure you have Python 2.7 or Python 3 installed on your system.
Make sure you have the latest version of Python 2 installed on your system.
Make sure you have Python 3 installed on your system, preferably version 3.5.
errors.golden_answer: Make sure you have Python 3.6 or higher installed on your system.

errors.error_description: The command to install dependencies `pip install -r requirements.txt --update-all` is incorrect because `--update-all` is not a valid pip flag.
correction_candidates: Run `pip install -r requirements.txt --upgrade` to install and update the required packages.
Run `pip install --update-all -r requirements.txt` to install the required packages.
Run `pip install -r requirements.txt` to install the required packages.
Run `pip update --all -r requirements.txt` to install the required packages.
errors.golden_answer: Run `pip install -r requirements.txt` to install the required packages.
